code: @Test public void gauge() throws Exception {     ISimpleMXBean simpleBean = getSimpleMXBean().     // we should get an event after the number exceeds 100 or drops below 50     simpleBean.setMonitorNumber(75).     simpleBean.setMonitorNumber(110).     getMockFixture().waitForMessages().     getMockFixture().assertMessageReceived(new File("src/test/resources/monitor-consumer/gaugeNotification-high.xml")).     getMockFixture().getMockEndpoint().setExpectedMessageCount(1).     simpleBean.setMonitorNumber(90).     Thread.sleep(600).     simpleBean.setMonitorNumber(60).     Thread.sleep(600).     simpleBean.setMonitorNumber(40).     getMockFixture().waitForMessages().     getMockFixture().assertMessageReceived(new File("src/test/resources/monitor-consumer/gaugeNotification-low.xml")). }
